title: Starting Point
text: A full rotation (360° or $$2\pi$$ radians) brings you back to the starting point. So, what happens if you add or subtract full rotations from any given angle?

title: Terminal Side
text: If you keep adding or subtracting full rotations, what happens to the angle? Does it still share the same terminal side?

title: Number of Coterminal angles
text: Considering that you can keep adding or subtracting 360° (or 2pi) multiple times, how many coterminal angles can exist?
